title: Jayson Tatum reportedly plans to play this season, posts video of him dunking
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Morning Sports Update "The Celtics haven't ruled out Jayson Tatum for the season and they're cautiously optimistic.
" Jayson Tatum tore his Achilles in May, but is hoping to get back on the court sooner than most players who've suffered the injury.
Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff By Conor Roche October 10, 2025 | 11:00 AM 5 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: After arrest, Paul Pierce says he was just ‘old’ and ‘tired,’ not drunk
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Boston Celtics Pierce was arrested after he was found asleep behind the wheel of an SUV Tuesday, according to officials.
Paul Pierce speaks at a news conference at Mohegan Sun, Sept.
10, 2021, in Uncasville, Conn.

title: Boston meteorologists warn of a coastal storm to cap off the holiday weekend
author: Heather Alterisio
bullets: Weather After some sunshine to start the long weekend, a coastal storm will slowly move in, bringing "wind, rain, minor coastal flooding and erosion late Sunday into Tuesday," according to meteorologists.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Cindy Fitzgibbon, WCVB: ‘Rain is slow to spread in from the south late Sunday but will linger into Tuesday’ NEXT 7 DAYS…Sunshine into Saturday.

title: New York Attorney General Letitia James charged in fraud case after pressure campaign by Trump
author: The Associated Press
bullets: National News In a lengthy statement, James decried the indictment as “nothing more than a continuation of the president’s desperate weaponization of our justice system.
” New York Attorney General Letitia James speaks during a press briefing, Feb.
16, 2024, in New York.

title: Haverhill police chief retires amid no confidence vote, criticism after officer’s death
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News “I have accepted his resignation.
